kw.name: Drop Collection
kw.doc:
Drops the given collection.
Arguments: - _collectionName_: the name of the collection to drop
Example: | Drop Collection | myCollection |

kw.name: Insert Json Document Into Collection
kw.doc:
Inserts the given Json-Document into the given collection.
Arguments: - _collectionName_: the name of the target collection - _jsonString_: the json document to persist
Example: | Insert Json Document Into Collection | myCollection | {say : 'Hello MongoDB!'} |
